home.title: Welcome to Winter Game
home.subtitle: A seasonal event and challenge hub available right inside Telegram.

missions.title: Winter Missions
missions.description: Complete daily quests and collect crystals to climb the seasonal leaderboard.

tournaments.title: Team Tournaments
tournaments.description: Team up with friends and compete in tournaments inside Telegram chats.

rewards.title: Reward Store
rewards.description: Exchange points for exclusive stickers, skins, and merchandise.

paragraphs.mission: Winter Game is a seasonal gaming platform designed specifically for Telegram. Our goal is to bring players together in a tight-knit community where they can compete, complete missions, and earn unique rewards.
paragraphs.technology: The project is built with modern web technologies and optimized for instant loading inside mini-apps. We continuously expand the level lineup, add team events, and introduce new mechanics to keep players engaged.
paragraphs.feedback: If you have ideas or questions, reach out to us â€” we are always open to feedback!
